languages.text: "С радостью. Мы служим Императору и Человечеству с незапамятных времен, бьемся со злом по воле святой {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g}, мы..." {n}Арджента обрывает сама себя и фыркает под нос.{/n} "Прошу простить меня, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Начала рассказывать то, что знает любой мелкий дворянин в Империуме! Так что же именно вас интересует?"

traits.locale_text: "С радостью. Мы служим Императору и человечеству с незапамятных времен, бьемся со злом по воле святой Экклезиархии, мы..." {n}Арджента обрывает сама себя и фыркает под нос.{/n} "Прошу простить меня, Вольный Торговец. Начала рассказывать то, что знает всякий ребенок в Империуме! Так что же именно вас интересует?"

languages.text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"
languages.original_text: "С радостью. Мы служим Императору и Человечеству с незапамятных времен, бьемся со злом по воле святой {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Экклезиархии{/g}, мы..." {n}Арджента обрывает сама себя и фыркает под нос.{/n} "Прошу простить меня, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Вольный Торговец{/g}. Начала рассказывать то, что знает любой мелкий дворянин в Империуме! Так что же именно вас интересует?"

traits.locale_text: "Gladly. We serve the Emperor and humanity since time immemorial, we fight evil by the will of the holy Ecclesiarchy, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Rogue Trader. Here I am, talking about what every child in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested to hear about?"

"Gladly. We serve the Emperor and humanity since time immemorial, we fight evil by the will of the holy Ecclesiarchy, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Rogue Trader. Here I am, talking about what every child in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested to hear about?"

Here I am, talking about what every child in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

"Gladly. We serve the Emperor and humanity since time immemorial, we fight evil by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every child in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

"Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

"Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

languages.text: “我很乐意。没有人比我的姐妹更加忠于神皇。我们遵循着神圣{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}的意志，与祂的敌人作战，我们……”{n}阿洁塔住了口，哼了一声。{/n}“请原谅，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。看看我啊，我说的这些话，就连帝国的小贵族都早已了如指掌！你具体想了解哪些方面呢？”
languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

traits.locale_text: “我很乐意。没有人比我的姐妹更加忠于神皇。我们遵循着神圣{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}国教{/g}的意志，与祂的敌人作战，我们……”{n}阿洁塔住了口，哼了一声。{/n}“请原谅，{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}行商浪人{/g}。看看我啊，我说的这些话，就连帝国的小贵族都早已了如指掌！你具体想了解哪些方面呢？”

languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy Ecclesiarchy, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Rogue Trader. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

languages.text: «Con mucho gusto. No hay nadie más fiel al Dios Emperador que mis hermanas. Luchamos contra Sus enemigos por voluntad de la santa {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g}, y...». {n}Argenta se interrumpe y resopla.{/n} «Lo siento, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. ¡Lo que le estoy contando es lo que todo noble menor del Imperium ya sabe! ¿Qué quería saber, concretamente?».
languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

traits.locale_text: «Con mucho gusto. No hay nadie más fiel al Dios Emperador que mis hermanas. Luchamos contra Sus enemigos por voluntad de la santa {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Eclesiarquía{/g}, y...». {n}Argenta se interrumpe y resopla.{/n} «Lo siento, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Comerciante Independiente{/g}. ¡Lo que le estoy contando es lo que todo noble menor del Imperium ya sabe! ¿Qué quería saber, concretamente?».

languages.text: 「喜んで。私の姉妹ほど神帝陛下に忠実な者はいないだろう。我々は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の意志によって、皇帝の敵と戦っているのだ。我々は…」{n}アルジェンタは自分の言葉を中断し、鼻を鳴らす。{/n}「失礼した、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}。今話していたのは、帝国の民であれば誰でも知っているようなことだったな。それで、何を聞きたいのだろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

traits.locale_text: 「喜んで。私の姉妹ほど神帝陛下に忠実な者はいないだろう。我々は{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}帝国聖教会{/g}の意志によって、皇帝の敵と戦っているのだ。我々は…」{n}アルジェンタは自分の言葉を中断し、鼻を鳴らす。{/n}「失礼した、{g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}ローグトレーダー{/g}。今話していたのは、帝国の民であれば誰でも知っているようなことだったな。それで、何を聞きたいのだろうか？」

languages.text: "Gerne. Niemand ist dem Gottimperator treuer ergeben als meine Schwestern. Wir bekämpfen seine Feinde, wie es der Wille der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} ist, wir ..." {n}Argenta unterbricht sich und schnaubt kurz auf.{/n} "Verzeiht, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}. Ich rede wie ein Wasserfall über etwas, was jeder niedere Adlige im Imperium weiß! Was genau möchtet Ihr also hören?"
languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

traits.locale_text: "Gerne. Niemand ist dem Gottimperator treuer ergeben als meine Schwestern. Wir bekämpfen seine Feinde, wie es der Wille der {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekklesiarchie{/g} ist, wir ..." {n}Argenta unterbricht sich und schnaubt kurz auf.{/n} "Verzeiht, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}{/g}. Ich rede wie ein Wasserfall über etwas, was jeder niedere Adlige im Imperium weiß! Was genau möchtet Ihr also hören?"

languages.text: « Avec joie. Personne n'est aussi fidèle à l'Empereur-Dieu que mes sœurs. Nous nous battons contre Ses ennemis par la volonté de la sainte {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g}, nous... » {n}Argenta s'interrompt et renifle.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Voilà que je me mets à vous répéter des choses que le moindre nobliau de l'Imperium connaît par cœur ! Alors dites moi : que voulez-vous savoir, au juste ? »
languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. We fight against His enemies by the will of the holy {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclesiarchy{/g}, we..." {n}Argenta interrupts herself and snorts.{/n} "I beg your pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Rogue Trader{/g}. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

traits.locale_text: « Avec joie. Personne n'est aussi fidèle à l'Empereur-Dieu que mes sœurs. Nous nous battons contre Ses ennemis par la volonté de la sainte {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ecclésiarchie{/g}, nous... » {n}Argenta s'interrompt et renifle.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}{mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}{/g}. Voilà que je me mets à vous répéter des choses que le moindre nobliau de l'Imperium connaît par cœur ! Alors dites moi : que voulez-vous savoir, au juste ? »

languages.text: "Zevkle. Rahibe kardeşlerim, Tanrı İmparator'un en sadık hizmetkârlarıdır. O'nun düşmanlarına karşı yüce {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi'nin{/g} iradesiyle savaşır..." {n}Argenta duraksayıp burnundan bir soluk veriyor.{/n} "Affedersin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}. İmparatorluk'taki her asilzadenin bildiği şeyleri sana anlatmaya kalkıyorum! Hususi olarak bilmek istediğin bir şey var mıydı?"
languages.original_text: "Gladly. There are none more faithful to the God-Emperor than my sisters. Here I am, talking about what every lesser noble in the Imperium knows! So what exactly are you interested in hearing about?"

traits.locale_text: "Zevkle. Rahibe kardeşlerim, Tanrı İmparator'un en sadık hizmetkârlarıdır. O'nun düşmanlarına karşı yüce {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMinistorum}Ekleşiarşi{/g}'nin iradesiyle savaşır..." {n}Argenta duraksayıp burnundan bir soluk veriyor.{/n} "Affedersin {g|Encyclopedia:RogueTrader}Hür Tacir{/g}. İmparatorluk'taki her asilzadenin bildiği şeyleri sana anlatmaya kalkıyorum! Hususi olarak bilmek istediğin bir şey var mıydı?"
